generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white lane markings, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and poles.
- building: A large modern building with a checkered glass facade is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible on the left side of the road, next to the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, with one showing green.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a yield sign and a right-turn sign.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- car: The front of a car is visible at the bottom of the image, indicating the perspective of the driver.
